sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-productlist', templateUrl: './productlist.component.html', styleUrls: ['./productlist.component.css'] }) export class ProductlistComponent { }
{{ product.name }}

{{ product.description | slice: 0:50 }}...

{{ product.price | currency:'INR'}}

Discount Price: {{ product.discountPrice|currency:'INR' }}
